title: Republican National Convention: Wednesday, July 20
description: Day two of the Republican National Convention in Cleveland. This episode: host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, congressional correspondent Susan Davis, and editor/correpsondent Ron Elving. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org
